name: Vegan Yellow Curry Recipe
description: This vegan yellow curry recipe makes a delicious meal that's perfect with the family. Serve with jasmine rice to soak up all that creamy sauce!

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu to remove excess moisture, then cut into small cubes. Heat a small amount of oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Sauté the tofu cubes, turning occasionally, until they’re crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour a quarter of the coconut milk into a large wok or pot. Allow the milk to reduce, stirring occasionally. When you notice the oil beginning to separate from the milk, proceed to the next step.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the yellow curry paste to the reduced coconut milk. Cook and stir until the mixture becomes aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining coconut milk, palm sugar, salt, potatoes, carrots, and onions. Reduce the heat to low and let the curry gently simmer for about 8 minutes, or until the vegetables and potatoes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the fried tofu, stir to combine, and then remove from the heat. Serve immediately with rice. Enjoy!
